name: Labyrinth (itch) (Muselle)
description:
"Begin at the beginning," the King said, very gravely, "and go on till you come to the end: then stop." ― Lewis Carroll, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

In Labyrinth, your objective is not to get out, but to find the 12 hidden objects. Choose your strategy and make your way through this immense maze. Are you a wall follower? Do you rely on deduction? Memory? Luck?

Tip: On your way, you'll come across red barrels. Can you figure out what they mean?

Go on, and don't get lost.
